SEARCH
Package librarySE.utils

Class Config

java.lang.Object
librarySE.utils.Config
public final class Config extends Object
Provides centralized configuration management for the library system.

The Config class loads, reads, and writes key-value settings from a single configuration file located at data/config/fine-config.properties. It automatically creates the configuration file with default values if it does not exist.

Key Features:

  • Automatic creation of configuration directories and default file.
  • Support for retrieving String, int, double, and boolean values.
  • Ability to update configuration values and reload them at runtime.
  • Thread-safe operations for reading and writing.

This class is declared final and cannot be instantiated. All methods and properties are static for global access.

Author:
Malak

  • Method Details

    • reload

      public static void reload()
      Reloads all configuration values from disk.

      Useful when the configuration file is modified manually or by another process.

    • get

      public static String get(String key, String def)
      Retrieves a configuration value as a raw string.
      Parameters:
      key - the configuration key (e.g. "fine.book.rate")
      def - the default value if key is missing
      Returns:
      the configuration value or the default if not found

    • getInt

      public static int getInt(String key, int def)
      Retrieves a configuration value as an integer.
      Parameters:
      key - the configuration key
      def - default value if key not found or invalid
      Returns:
      parsed integer value, or default if parsing fails

    • getDouble

      public static double getDouble(String key, double def)
      Retrieves a configuration value as a double.
      Parameters:
      key - the configuration key
      def - default value if key not found or invalid
      Returns:
      parsed double value, or default if parsing fails

    • getBoolean

      public static boolean getBoolean(String key, boolean def)
      Retrieves a configuration value as a boolean.

      Accepts "true", "1", or "yes" (case-insensitive) as true values.

      Parameters:
      key - the configuration key
      def - default value if key not found
      Returns:
      boolean interpretation of the configuration value

    • set

      public static void set(String key, String value)
      Saves or updates a configuration key-value pair on disk.

      If the key already exists, it will be overwritten. Automatically appends a timestamp comment to the properties file.

      Parameters:
      key - the property name
      value - the new value to set

      public static Path getConfigFile()
      Returns:
